item.title: Harvey Weinstein’s ‘Revenge’ Lawsuit Against #MeToo Whistleblower Is Dismissed
item.description: A judge on Tuesday threw out Harvey Weinstein’s lawsuit against Irwin Reiter, the head of accounting at the Weinstein Co. who blew the whistle on him in 2017. Weinstein sued Reiter, his brother
